title: Runbow
notes: Steam shows Very Positive (85% of 98). Metacritic metascore 82 (Wii U) with user score 7.4; blended low‑80s.
raw_comment: Platform racing. 9 players. 🎮 9 PS4 with SteamInput off. 🎮 9 XBox if 4 are connected before game start. (9 via reWASD. Activate virtual PS4 before game start.) ⌨ 9 on keyboard. 🖥️ Shared screen.
